attributes.action: Force Face Book to take Legal action against online bullies
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition to get Face Book to take responsibility and legal action, against Groups & Pages that promote and allow comments to remain on their pages for the following:-
Abusive comments.
Hate speech,
Harassment,
Intimidation,
Threats,
Dehumanise,
Humiliate,
Discriminate.
A good example of a set of groups that manages to cover all the above are:-
The Walter Mitty Hunters Club HQ, & Walter Cumper HQ.
These and others are allowed to break several UK laws, and Face Book fails to act.
We hope this petition will force Face Book to act within our Laws & decent morals. And close the offenders down, and report them to the police for offences they've committed. Then the Police/ CPS & Courts can deal with these online abusers accordingly.
